title: Basic Qaida with Tajweed
description: Learn Quranic alphabets and basic Tajweed rules for proper pronunciation.
objectives: Learn Arabic letters and sounds
Recognize joined forms and vowels
Pronounce letters correctly from Makharij

title: Nazra Quran with Tajweed
description: Recite the Holy Quran fluently with proper pronunciation and Tajweed rules under expert guidance.
targetAudience: Children and adults aiming for complete Quran recitation.
objectives: Recite full Quran correctly with fluency.
Identify and apply Tajweed rules while reading.
Build consistency and love for Quran recitation.

title: Masnoon Duas & Namaz
description: Learn essential daily Duas and the complete Namaz (Salah) with proper words, meanings, and etiquette.
targetAudience: Kids, reverts, and anyone wanting to learn correct Islamic practices.
objectives: Memorize daily Masnoon Duas with meanings.
Understand the steps and words of Salah.
Improve focus and mindfulness in worship.

title: Tajweed-ul-Quran
description: Master the essential Tajweed rules and correct your Quranic recitation with precision and spiritual depth.
targetAudience: Muslims of all ages eager to recite Quran as revealed.
objectives: Understand & apply Tajweed rules (Ikhfa, Idgham, etc.)
Master articulation points (Makharij)
Identify and correct common recitation mistakes

title: Tarjuma Tul Quran
description: Understand the Quran by learning the word-by-word Urdu translation and gaining spiritual insight.
targetAudience: Muslims who want to understand Quran directly.
prerequisites: Nazra Quran or basic Arabic reading.
objectives: Learn literal meaning of Quranic verses
Connect deeply with Allahâ€™s message
Build habit of reflection (Tadabbur)

title: Tafsir-ul-Quran
description: Explore the divine meanings, context, and lessons of the Quran through in-depth explanation (Tafsir).
targetAudience: Students and adults seeking deep Quranic understanding.
prerequisites: Tarjuma Tul Quran or basic understanding of Arabic.
objectives: Understand the context behind Surahs (Asbab-un-Nuzool)
Reflect on the lessons and values of each verse
Apply Quranic guidance in daily life

title: Fahm-Ul-Quran
description: A holistic course combining translation, tafsir, and spiritual reflection to understand and live the Quran.
targetAudience: Anyone wishing to connect with the Quran emotionally and intellectually.
prerequisites: Basic Quran reading & willingness to reflect.
objectives: Understand the themes of each Surah
Reflect on moral, social, and spiritual lessons
Develop love and awe for the Quran
